name: Skømp
description:
Skømp is a happy go-lucky platformer with pizzazz.

With the help of your 27 closest friends, traverse this dewy floral landscape, unlocking doors and exploring your moral code. 

*Note - This WebGL contains bug fixes.  For viewing our original submission, please download from the linked file, or visit http://planeteightgames.com/LD43-WebGL/ to play in browser.
